p:
Different Kilifi HMPV subgroups identified between 2007 and 2016 were determined. To assess the association between HMPV subgroup and disease severity, we performed Fisher’s exact test. Individuals were defined syndromically as either severe or very severe based on WHO definitions [ 39]. The clinical definitions have been described previously [ 28, 29, 31]. A p-value of
≤ 0.05 was considered to be significant. Statistical analysis was conducted using STATA v13.1 (College Station Texas, USA).
